divs: Sighting DetailsHaving a fire when the disk appeared coming from the north. I first noticed it when I went in to get a drink I saw it behind an airplane moving somewhat eraticly. My reactions where holy mackeral! When I saw it I instatly knew it was not a helicopter or an air plane. But what caught my attention was the fact that it made no noise. I lost sight of it when it wentwent behind some trees.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Hudson
There were no other sightings in Hudson on or around September 9th 2008
Summary: Disc shape, made no noise at all, was following an airplane.
